channel.description: Recent content in Javascripts on Pauls's Notes On Data & Software Engineering

item.title: Master JavaScript Mindmap
item.description: JavaScript, the language of the web! It’s a powerful language. I wanted to share some of what I learnt over the years whilst giving myself a refresher course. To kick things off, I put a mindmap together. It’s a work in progress, but it’s a reference for me, and if I update the underlying mindmap, I’ll update this page too. I’m hoping it will be of some use to others beginning on their JavaScript journey.
